page.title: 03Age Concern Centre (cont)
page.content: We{interviewed}some members to see what they thought of the centre. They all enjoy it very much. The reason is that they get bored and lonely on their own. They like having people to talk to. Most pensioners go to the centre on Monday, Wednesday and Thursday because they get hot meals. Most of the people live near the centre. Those who don't, get voluntary drivers to take them to the centre. Many of the pensioners started coming because relitives had died and they were {lonely.}Visiting the centre added joy} and excitement to their lives.
